detachmentRule.name: Sacred Rites
detachmentRule.lore: At times of war, the Adepta Sororitas make offerings to the Emperor in prayer, incense and blood. In such pious devotion, they may attract his blessing and enact miraculous deeds in his holy name.
detachmentRule.description: Each ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army can perform up to two Acts of Faith per phase, instead of one.

enhacements.name: Litanies of Faith
enhacements.lore: This unassuming parchment is one of the holiest relics in the Ministorum's charge, its mere presence enough to fill the hearts of the faithful with righteous fervour.
enhacements.description: CANONESS or PALATINE model only. At the start of your Command phase, if the bearer is on the battlefield, and has a Leadership test for the bearer. If that test is passed, you gain 1 Miracle dice.

enhacements.name: Blade of Saint Ellynor
enhacements.lore: Forged from thrice-blessed silver, this blade has the names and deeds of a thousand saints inscribed on one side on the molecular level, while the other has the entire Fede Imperialis etched into its form. The blade glows with righteous power and has slain heretics, mutants and xenos beyond counting.
enhacements.description: ADEPTA SORORITAS model only. Improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of the bearerâ€™s melee weapons by 1, and those weapons have the [PRECISION] ability. In addition, each time the bearer fights, if one or more enemy models are destroyed by those attacks, you gain 1 Miracle dice.

enhacements.name: Divine Aspect
enhacements.lore: Enemy warriors tremble before the radiant majesty of one blessed by the Emperor.
enhacements.description: ADEPTA SORORITAS model only. In your Movement phase, you can select one enemy unit within 12" of the bearer; that unit must take a Battle-shock test. If that test is failed, you gain 1 Miracle dice.

enhacements.name: Triptych of the Macharian Crusade
enhacements.lore: Carried onto the most fire-swept of battlefields, the images of the Macharian Trinity glorifies three missionaries who saved thousands of lives. This adamantine-sheathed relic reminds the bearer that faith alone can weather the most grievous adversities.
enhacements.description: ADEPTA SORORITAS model only. Each time the bearer uses an Act of Faith to substitute a saving throw, that saving throw is successful, irrespective of the value of the Miracle dice used.

stratagems.name: shield of faith
stratagems.lore: There is no armour as resilient as conviction itself.
stratagems.when: Any phase, just after an ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army suffers a mortal wound.
stratagems.target: That ADEPTA SORORITAS unit, or one friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS JUMP PACK unit within 3" of that unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against mortal wounds. If you targeted an ADEPTA SORORITAS JUMP PACK unit from your army with this Stratagem, then until the end of the phase, while a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS unit is within 3" of your unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against mortal wounds.

stratagems.name: light of the emperor
stratagems.lore: The Emperor's radiance shines upon his warriors, magnifying their purity in their darkest hour.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is blessed. While a unit is blessed, it can ignore any or all modifiers to the following: the profile characteristics of its models; the Weapon Skill or Ballistic Skill characteristics of weapons equipped by its models; any roll or test made for it (excluding modifiers to saving throws). If your unit has the JUMP PACK keyword, until the end of the turn, while a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS unit is within 3" of your unit, that friendly unit is also blessed.

stratagems.name: faith and fury
stratagems.lore: The righteous zeal of the Sisters of Battle burns bright as they charge towards their foes.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LANCE] ability. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as the result of your unit's attacks this phase, you gain 1 Miracle dice.

stratagems.name: blinding radiance
stratagems.lore: The Emperor's divinity manifests in golden halos, blinding the enemy with radiant light.
stratagems.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks, or one friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS JUMP PACK unit within 3" of such a unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll. If you targeted an ADEPTA SORORITAS JUMP PACK unit from your army with this Stratagem, then until the end of the phase, while a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS unit is within 3" of your unit, each time an attack targets that unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: divine guidance
stratagems.lore: With miraculous precision, the blows of the Sisters of Battle strike the weak points of enemy armour.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as the result of any of those attacks, you gain 1 Miracle dice.

stratagems.name: angelic descent
stratagems.lore: On wings of fire do the angelic warriors of the Orders Militant descend to battle.
stratagems.when: End of your opponent's Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS JUMP PACK unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.
stratagems.restrictions: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
